sources.title: The Huggetts Abroad
sources.description: Title: The Huggetts Abroad Summary: Life is not going well for the Huggetts. Father has lost his job. Jimmy and his wife cannot get to South Africa where he has a new job. So the family decide that they should go to South ... Directed by: Ken Annakin Actors: Jack Warner, Kathleen Harrison, Dinah Sheridan Production Company: Gainsborough Pictures Release Date: May 1949 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Life is not going well for the Huggetts. Father has lost his job. Jimmy and his wife cannot get to South Africa where he has a new job. So the family decide that they should go to South Africa by truck. With their travelling companion they travel across the desert which includes a brush with the law.

metadata.Plot: Life is not going well for the Huggetts. Father has lost his job. Jimmy and his wife cannot get to South Africa where he has a new job. So the family decide that they should go to South Africa by truck. With their travelling companion they travel across the desert which includes a brush with the law.
metadata.Writer: Keith Campbell, Gerard Bryant, Ted Willis
metadata.Actors: Jack Warner, Kathleen Harrison, Dinah Sheridan
